basic_information.scholarship_name: Susan Titus Endowed Memorial Scholarship or The Independent Insurance Agents of Oklahoma Susan Titus Endowed Memorial Scholarship

description: The Independent Insurance Agents of Oklahoma Susan Titus Endowed Memorial Scholarship is open to U.S citizens with a declared finance or finance and risk management major or minor. Students must have completed at least 12 hours of credit at the time of application and have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Students must be enrolled for the semester the scholarship is disbursed. Eligibility Requirements US Citizen Declared Finance or Finance and Risk Management major or minor Completed a minimum of 12 hours Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Selection Process Preference given to incoming sophomores and juniors Preference given to insurance and risk management majors Award Requirements Once the recipient receives the scholarship, he/she will continue to hold the scholarship for maximum of 3 years or until graduation, whichever comes first, provided a minimum 3.0 GPA They continue to make progress towards a degree in finance (minor in insurance and risk management)
